issues.description: The problem statementâ€™s Part 2 Step 4 text and test name refer to a method getTotalStudents(), but the UML diagram and solution implementation define the method as getTotalNumberOfStudents(). This naming mismatch can confuse students about which method signature to implement and will likely cause test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the method name across all artifacts. For example, change the problem statement and test name in Part 2 Step 4 from getTotalStudents() (and getTotalStudentsTest) to getTotalNumberOfStudents() (and getTotalNumberOfStudentsTest) so it matches the UML and solution implementation.
